creator: brody@gebit.de
text:
the javadoc of the XMLlayout class notices about a DTD, which have to be used 
for validated XML and presents a link to 'doc-files/log4j.dtd', which can not 
be fulfilled out of the api documentation.
Searching around, the missing DTD can be found in the supplied src.zip inside 
the directory /java/org/apache/log4j/xml.

creator: Ralph.Nagel@t-systems.com
text:
This problem occurs also for the XMLSample-file. 
The link on the page 
jakarta-log4j-1.2.8\docs\api\org\apache\log4j\xml\examples\XMLSample.html

refers to 
jakarta-log4j-1.2.8\docs\api\org\apache\log4j\xml\examples\doc-files\sample1.xml

But the files are in
jakarta-log4j-1.1.3\jakarta-log4j-1.1.3\src\java\org\apache\log4j\xml\examples\

creator: mwomack@apache.org
text:
1.2.12 candidate

This is just a javadoc change.
*** Bug 17227 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
